rationale: The segment reports market share but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: With this year's boost and demand from importers, Brazil is expected to hold a nearly 38% market share of the global chicken trade, up from around 36% in 2022, ABPA said.

rationale: This is a factual statement about market share, without using high-potency language.
statement_text: With this year's boost and demand from importers, Brazil is expected to hold a nearly 38% market share of the global chicken trade, up from around 36% in 2022, ABPA said.
